name: A. Football
statement:
One day Vasya decided to have a look at the results of Berland 1910
Football Championship s finals. Unfortunately he didn’t find the overall
score of the match; however, he got hold of a profound description of
the match’s process. On the whole there are lines in that description
each of which described one goal. Every goal was marked with the name of
the team that had scored it. Help Vasya, learn the name of the team that
won the finals. It is guaranteed that the match did not end in a tie.
